verses.verse: Then <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%>, who is <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him, rose up <S%H7925>early<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> beside the well of <S%H5878>Harod<s%>: so that the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> were on the north <S%H6828>side<s%> of them, by the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh<s%>, in the <S%H6010>valley<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, The <S%H5971>people<s%> that are with thee are too <S%H7227>many<s%> for me to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> into their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, lest <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6286>vaunt<s%> themselves against me, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Mine own <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath <S%H3467>saved<s%> me.

Now therefore go <S%H4994>to<s%>, <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Whosoever is <S%H3373>fearful<s%> and <S%H2730>afraid<s%>, let him <S%H7725>return<s%> and depart <S%H6852>early<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>. And there <S%H7725>returned<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>; and there <S%H7604>remained<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, The <S%H5971>people<s%> are yet too <S%H7227>many<s%>; bring them <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H4325>water<s%>, and I will <S%H6884>try<s%> them for thee there: and it shall be, that of whom I <S%H559>say<s%> unto thee, This shall <S%H3212>go<s%> with thee, the same shall <S%H3212>go<s%> with thee; and of whomsoever I <S%H559>say<s%> unto thee, This shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> with thee, the same shall not <S%H3212>go<s%>.

So he brought <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H4325>water<s%>: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, Every one that <S%H3952>lappeth<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> with his <S%H3956>tongue<s%>, as a <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H3952>lappeth<s%>, him shalt thou <S%H3322>set<s%> by himself; likewise every one that boweth <S%H3766>down<s%> upon his <S%H1290>knees<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

And the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them that <S%H3952>lapped<s%>, putting their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>: but all the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> bowed <S%H3766>down<s%> upon their <S%H1290>knees<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, By the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H3952>lapped<s%> will I <S%H3467>save<s%> you, and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and let all the other <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H4725>place<s%>.

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6720>victuals<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and their <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>: and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H376>all<s%> the rest of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H168>tent<s%>, and <S%H2388>retained<s%> those <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>: and the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> was beneath him in the <S%H6010>valley<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass the same <S%H3915>night<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, get thee <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H4264>host<s%>; for I have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
But if thou <S%H3373>fear<s%> to go <S%H3381>down<s%>, <S%H3381>go<s%> thou with <S%H6513>Phurah<s%> thy <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4264>host<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H8085>hear<s%> what they <S%H1696>say<s%>; and <S%H310>afterward<s%> shall thine <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> to go <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H4264>host<s%>. Then went he <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H6513>Phurah<s%> his <S%H5288>servant<s%> unto the <S%H7097>outside<s%> of the armed <S%H2571>men<s%> that were in the <S%H4264>host<s%>.

And the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> and the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> and all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H5307>lay<s%> along in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> like <S%H697>grasshoppers<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>; and their <S%H1581>camels<s%> were without <S%H4557>number<s%>, as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H8193>side<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.

And when <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%>, behold, there was a <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5608>told<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> unto his <S%H7453>fellow<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, I <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and, lo, a <S%H6742%H6742>cake<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H2015>tumbled<s%> into the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto a <S%H168>tent<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it that it <S%H5307>fell<s%>, and <S%H2015%H4605>overturned<s%> it, that the <S%H168>tent<s%> lay <S%H5307>along<s%>.

And his <S%H7453>fellow<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, This is nothing else save the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%>, a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: for into his <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, and all the <S%H4264>host<s%>.

¶ And it was so, when <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H4557>telling<s%> of the <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and the <S%H7667>interpretation<s%> thereof, that he <S%H7812>worshipped<s%>, and <S%H7725>returned<s%> into the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>; for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>.

And he <S%H2673>divided<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> into <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies<s%>, and he <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in every man's <S%H3027>hand<s%>, with <S%H7386>empty<s%> <S%H3537>pitchers<s%>, and <S%H3940>lamps<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H7200>Look<s%> on me, and <S%H6213>do<s%> likewise: and, behold, when I <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H7097>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, it shall be that, as I <S%H6213>do<s%>, so shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%>.

When I <S%H8628>blow<s%> with a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, I and all that are with me, then <S%H8628>blow<s%> ye the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> also on every <S%H5439>side<s%> of all the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, The sword of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and of <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>.

¶ So <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, and the <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that were with him, <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H7097>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> in the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H821>watch<s%>; and they had <S%H389>but<s%> <S%H6965>newly<s%> <S%H6965>set<s%> the <S%H8104>watch<s%>: and they <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>, and <S%H5310>brake<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers<s%> that were in their <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>, and <S%H7665>brake<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers<s%>, and <S%H2388>held<s%> the <S%H3940>lamps<s%> in their <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> in their <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H8628>blow<s%> withal: and they <S%H7121>cried<s%>, The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and of <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>.

And they <S%H5975>stood<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in his place round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>: and all the <S%H4264>host<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%>, and <S%H7321>cried<s%>, and <S%H5127%H5127>fled<s%>.

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> against his <S%H7453>fellow<s%>, even throughout all the <S%H4264>host<s%>: and the <S%H4264>host<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> to <S%H1029>Beth-shittah<s%> in <S%H6888>Zererath<s%>, and to the <S%H8193>border<s%> of <S%H65>Abel-meholah<s%>, unto <S%H2888>Tabbath<s%>.

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6817>together<s%> out of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, and out of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, and out of all <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%>.

¶ And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> throughout all <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%>, and <S%H3920>take<s%> before them the <S%H4325>waters<s%> unto <S%H1012>Beth-barah<s%> and <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>. Then all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6817>together<s%>, and <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> unto <S%H1012>Beth-barah<s%> and <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

And they <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%>, <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%>; and they <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> upon the <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H6159>Oreb<s%>, and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%> they <S%H2026>slew<s%> at the <S%H3342>winepress<s%> of <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%>, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.
